metadata.name: The Watcher
metadata.description:
If someone told you that one night everything would change, what would be the first question you would ask them? What if he told you that you would be the one to change everything? Sometimes a step is the beginning of a big change. Do you want to be the person who takes that step, the change itself or the person who watches them?! Maybe you could be all of them ...  
........  
Details:  
Digital painting, 4000*5000px, 300dpi
